## Who We Are

Kwiz Computing Technologies is a boutique data science consultancy founded on the principle that exceptional technical expertise should be accessible and personalized. As a small focused operation, we deliver enterprise-grade solutions with the agility and attention to detail that only a dedicated specialist can provide.

**Our Mission**: To empower organizations with data-driven insights and robust analytical solutions that drive meaningful business outcomes, while maintaining the highest standards of software engineering excellence.

## Meet the Team

::: {.team-profile}
![Jean Victor Kwizera](images/profile-placeholder.svg){.profile-image fig-alt="Jean Victor Kwizera profile photo"}

### Jean Victor Kwizera, MEIK

Kwizera is a cofounder and data scientist at Kwiz Computing Technologies, bringing together expertise in actuarial science, environmental analytics and full-stack software development. With a strong foundation in statistical modeling and spatial analysis, he leads our technical operations and drives innovation in data-driven solutions. His journey began with a BS in Actuarial Science from the University of Kabianga, where he distinguished himself by among others, winning the 2020 Inter-University Actuarial Innovation Challenge organized by Kenya's Insurance Regulatory Authority. 

As an Associate Member of the Environment Institute of Kenya (MEIK) and a registered Environmental Impact Assessment expert with NEMA, Kwizera bridges the gap between rigorous data science and environmental compliance. Since 2016, he has contributed to research on invasive plant population dynamics, forest inventory modeling and environmental impact assessments, with his work acknowledged in peer-reviewed publications. 

He specializes in the R ecosystem, developing enterprise-grade analytics dashboards and R Shiny applications that transform complex data into actionable insights. His technical expertise spans the full stack of modern data science tools‚Äîfrom R programming and AWS cloud infrastructure to spatial data modeling. At Kwiz Computing, Jean Victor oversees web development initiatives, leads data science engagements, manages our technology infrastructure and ensures our solutions meet the highest standards of software engineering while remaining accessible and user-friendly. 

He is passionate about data and technology for resilient ecosystems, knowledge sharing, having guided PhD students through practical applications of simulation and modeling in R. Jean is based in Kericho and Nairobi, Kenya. When he's not developing analytics solutions, you might find him cycling through nature.

[Connect with Jean Victor on LinkedIn](https://www.linkedin.com/in/jean-victor-kwizera) \| [Email: jeankwizera\@kwizresearch.com](mailto:jeankwizera@kwizresearch.com)
:::
